H0.text: Psychrometer is the instrument that should be used to monitor atmospheric pressure changes as a weather system approaches.

H1.text: Thermometer is the instrument used to monitor atmospheric pressure changes as a weather system approaches.

H2.text: An anemometer is the instrument used to monitor atmospheric pressure changes as a weather system approaches.

H3.text: Barometer is the instrument used to monitor atmospheric pressure changes as a weather system approaches.

A4.text: Pressure tendency, derived from barometric readings, can forecast short term weather changes.

A5.text: Barometric pressure and the pressure tendency have been used in weather forecasting since the late 19th century.
